Hi,

In my class, I have methods A(),B(), C(), where A() must be called before B(), B() before C(). I have individual test cases for each method. In order to run the tests in the specified order, I must arrange the actual methods in the appropriate order. I know this is not a good thing, so how do I avoid it? I really hate to lump them into one testcase. 

Thanks,


Scott
:-> Change is inevitable except from vending machines.
subject: method dependency
